definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: The police found a knife together with the stolen money, hidden in a hollow tree.
sentences.chinese: 警察在一个树洞里找到了藏匿的小刀，还有赃款。

sentences.english: Swindles after the ill-gotten money, is detained and returns the victim completely.
sentences.chinese: 所骗取的赃款后被全部扣押并发还被害人。

sentences.english: The embezzler was severely punished and enjoined to kick back a portion of the stolen money each month.
sentences.chinese: 贪污犯受到了严厉惩罚，并被责令每月退还部分赃款。

sentences.english: Tangmou and others will be money for new stock and decoration, wantonly squandered.
sentences.chinese: 唐某等人将赃款用于炒股和装修新房，大肆挥霍。

sentences.english: They came out of the bank carrying the money and the police caught them red-handed .
sentences.chinese: 他们带着赃款从银行里出来，被警察当场捉住。

definition: to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to make an appearance in court
(of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case
